item.description:
"Special Waterfire, Providence, RI"
http://www.waterfire....

On Friday, March 19th, is the Slam Dunk WaterFire sponsored by
Dunkin Donuts.
This lighting of the circle of flames at Waterplace Basin will begin around 7:30 p.m. and the fires will burn until 11:00 p.m.

I have never before photographed a waterfire and think its a great opportunity to take a diverse set of photographs in a night time setting.

Cody is going and you are all invited to join him- He'll host the click and shoot for this event!

If you plan on going don't forget your prime lens's and tripods!

Location, parking is cheap at the Providence place mall right across from the waterfire, $1-3 depending on time.

Meet up spot would be infront of Joe's American Bar and Grill

Time would be 7:45-8PM

My contact info is email is emailme@codybertrand.com (right to blackberry, aka live while there) and cell is 508-369-3307

Things to consider:
It is fire and it is smokey at times, could cause asmatic issues if prone to smoke related attacks. Also folks should really bring a tripod and prime's if they have them. Since it is a nighttime shoot, also warm clothing would be a highly recommended.

If you plan on going Please message Cody- if you are not going to show or are late just call Cody and let him know! :)

-Cody

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Providence Water Fire- Friday night!
